resources.string: Discover Inner Peace and Serenity with this app

Welcome to Peace Of Mind, your gateway to finding inner peace, tranquility, and a calmer mind.
 In today's fast-paced world, stress and anxiety have become prevalent.
 Our app is designed to help you achieve peace of mind through the practice of meditation and mindfulness.
 So thank you for downloading this app.
\nTap the following button to go Meditate Tab, so that you can get started Directly\n
So first of all, \nWhat is Peace of Mind?
